publ: by Ruckus Wireless, an ARRIS company
name: RuckusUnleashed
0:
”Alexa, ask ruckus unleashed to check internet connection”
”Alexa, ask ruckus unleashed how many clients are connected”
”Alexa, ask ruckus unleashed are there any update”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: ruckus unleashed
Developer Terms of Use
des:
With Ruckus Unleashed skill, now users can restart their access points without having to go to their mobile app or web browser. They can simply ask by saying things like, "Alexa, ask ruckus unleashed to restart Bulldog". In this case, Bulldog is the name of your Access Point. 

You can find out how many clients are connected to your unleashed network or check if your unleashed is connected to internet. Try saying things like, "Alexa, ask ruckus unleashed how many clients are connected" or "Alexa, ask ruckus unleashed are there any update". 

Here we are to make your life easy to manage your Wi-Fi.
